title: Embedding Contextual Information through Reward Shaping in Multi-Agent Learning: A Case Study from Google Football. (arXiv:2303.15471v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: Artificial Intelligence has been used to help human complete difficult tasks in complicated environments by providing optimized strategies for decision-making or replacing the manual labour. tldr: 本文提出了一种新的奖励塑形方法——CoRS，通过将上下文信息嵌入到奖励函数中来解决多智能体强化学习中的挑战。使用CoRS方法可以在Google Research Football等环境中更有效地实现智能体的训练和学习，并得到更高的胜率以及创建不同风格的足球游戏。
